lead_paragraph: Argentina striker Hernan Crespo has been cleared to play in tomorrow’s Copa América final against Brazil. Crespo sprained a thigh muscle in Argentina’s second game at the tournament. He had three goals before his injury.
snippet: Argentina striker Hernan Crespo has been cleared to play in tomorrow’s Copa América final against Brazil. Crespo sprained a thigh muscle in Argentina’s second game at the tournament. He had three goals before his injury.
